content: [iver_shield] "Not... like this," says the leader as he falls. You gather the bodies, taking their shields with you for show. "It'll be another fight when they realize what happened," says Iver. With the cart in tow you approach the gates, which are drawn open for you.

[rook] As Iver predicted, as soon as you cross through the gates the guards see unfamiliar faces, panic and draw weapons, while refugees rush through the open doors! A man wearing black watches the fight from a distance...
